metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23319 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A segmentation fault during PCF file parsing in pcf2bdf versions >=1.05 allows an attacker to trigger a program crash via a specially crafted PCF font file. This crash affects the availability of the software and dependent downstream components.

criterions.comment: pcf2bdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
